Uses of Package
com.microsoft.band

  • Packages that use com.microsoft.band 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.band  
    com.microsoft.band.notifications  
    com.microsoft.band.personalization  
    com.microsoft.band.sensors

  • Classes in com.microsoft.band used by com.microsoft.band 
    Class and Description
    BandClient
    Client for communicating with a Microsoft Band through Microsoft Health's band communication service
    BandClientManager
    Class for getting paired Microsoft Bands and creating new instances of BandClient
    BandConnectionCallback
    Listener for receiving changes to the ConnectionState of a BandClient
    BandErrorType
    Enumeration of error types
    BandException
    Thrown by SDK methods when they cannot be successfully completed
    BandInfo
    Interface representing a Microsoft Band
    BandIOException
    Thrown when there is a problem connecting to the Microsoft Health band communication service
    BandPendingResult
    Represents a pending result from calling a Microsoft Band SDK method.
    BandResultCallback
    An interface for receiving a result from a BandPendingResult as an asynchrounous callback
    BandTheme
    Class representing the theme for a Microsoft Band as a whole or for a specific tile
    ConnectionState
    Enumeration of the connection states to Microsoft Health's band communication service and the corresponding Microsoft Band
    UserConsent
    Enumeration of consent states
